name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **TypeScript**, **Docker**, **CI/CD**, and building **RESTful APIs** in high-performance environments. Proficient in the **AWS** cloud ecosystem, I specialize in modern front-end frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and state management tools like **Redux Toolkit** and **Zustand**. My back-end expertise includes **Node.js** and database management with **PostgreSQL** and **Prisma**. I am well-versed in integrating **LLM** technologies, specifically using **OpenAI**, **LangChain**, **PGVector**, and **Pinecone** for intelligent data solutions.

Throughout my career, I have developed enterprise-grade platforms in healthcare and financial sectors, creating robust applications aligned with compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. My extensive use of microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and automation in CI/CD ensures the delivery of secure and scalable solutions. Additionally, I possess hands-on experience in crafting machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools like MLflow and Airflow.
